content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

the proposal for a proof assistants StackExchange site by Andrej Bauer
http://math.andrej.com/2021/11/20/proof-assistants-stackexchange-site looks to
me like it is worth supporting.

I do agree that Zulip chats are a step backwards, concerning knowledge
accumulation with search engine coverage.

I do not agree that StackExchange is the best platform for knowledge
organization --- that would be probably Discourse, but supporting
StackExchange now is better than doing nothing.

Makarius

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Good idea, I have just signed up.

Tobias
smime.p7s
